title: About | Omanosaura
desc: Omanosaura aims to deliver a unique experience in Oman, and present the beuty and magic of Oman. From this the name Omanosaura was born, a one of a kind lizard that can be found in Oman only!

mission.title: Mission
mission.desc: Unique journeys, affordable prices and exceeding our clients expectations

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc: Quality service, creativity and innovation, social responsibility

1.name: Jaifar Al-Kindi
1.title: Founder of Omanosaura
1.desc: I've been working in the tourism field, specifically adventures, for 7+ years. And hold the international IRATA certificate for security in abseiling, and RCL for adventure and rescure equipment inspection. I am also a general tour guide licensed by the Ministry of Tourism.

2.name: Mohammed Al-Kindi
2.title: Transportaion Quality & Leader
2.desc: I've been in the field of cars and buses for 10 years. I pay attention to the finest details to ensure a comfortable a safe trip, whether its a city tour or an off-road adventure. I also work as tour leader, usually taking the front of group to guide the experience.

3.name: Khaled Al-Hadrami
3.title: Assistant Leader
3.desc: I have 3 years of experience in adventuring, enjoying the unique Omani nature as a part-time job in Omanosaura

4.name: Rishad Al-Toubi
4.title: Adventurer & Tour Guide
4.desc: 4+ years in trekking and adventures, and two years in tour guiding. I love exploring different cultures, nature and free-diving! specifically free-diving with a spear gun for fishing. I work as both a tour guide in city trips and a leader in adventures.

5.name: Muzna Al-Kindi
5.title: Marketing & Social Media
5.desc: I am responsible for managing the social media accounts, and videography. I love immortalizing experiences, especially those offered by Omanosaura, because they're distinguished from other experiences I participated in, whether they are in Oman or outside.

6.name: Ahmed Al-Kindi
6.title: Software Developer
6.desc: I am the developer and maintainer of omanosaura.com, ensuring you have a smooth experience searching and finding the right experience for you.
